text: My boo ❤️ got his 1st #COVID19 #Moderna #vaccine 💉🦠yesterday,  just above the site of a childhood shot, which kept him safe & healthy for yrs - so he’s now old & can get another shot to stay safe & healthy for more yrs #Gratitude 🙏🏾#VaccinesSaveLives #ScienceSaves #WearAMask https://t.co/V0h0g1uUEh
